sheep.graphics
Class Color

java.lang.Object
  android.graphics.Paint
      sheep.graphics.Color

public class Color
extends android.graphics.Paint

This class exists to simplify the creation of predefined pure-color Paint.

Constructor Detail

Color

public Color(int r,
             int g,
             int b)
Creates a new color with the specified components.

Parameters:
r - The red color component (0-255).
g - The green color component (0-255).
b - The blue color component (0-255).

Color

public Color(int a,
             int r,
             int g,
             int b)
Creates a new color with the specified components. Note that alpha is the first value.

Parameters:
a - The alpha component (0-255).
r - The red color component (0-255).
g - The green color component (0-255).
b - The blue color component (0-255).
